Step: Go to The Storerooms -> Storeroom Saboteurs

Go to Last Refuge Outskirts -> Evacuation
Go to Erza's Library -> Get Ledger
Go to The End of Time
Port to Council Chamber and go to Cultist Camp

Go to The Sanctum Bastille fight Boss
Go to Risen Lake and click Time Rift after Waypoint
